definition.de: Tätigkeitsbereiche, die eingebunden sind in Präventivmaßnahmen zur Verhinderung von Verstößen gegen gültige Gesetze, oder die Gesetzesbrecher vor Gericht zu bringen.
definition.dk: Forskellige aktiviteter for at forhindre kriminalitet eller straffe dem, der har begået kriminalitet.
definition.en-GB: Agencies that attempt to prevent disobedience to established laws or bring to justice those who disobey those laws
definition.en-US: Agencies that attempt to prevent disobedience to established laws or bring to justice those who disobey those laws
definition.pt-BR: Agências envolvidas na prevenção da desobediência às leis estabelecidas e em levar a tribunal os que desobedecem a essas leis.
definition.pt-PT: Agências envolvidas na prevenção da desobediência às leis estabelecidas e em levar a tribunal os que desobedecem a essas leis.
definition.se: Olika aktiviteter för att minimera brottslighet.
definition.zh-Hans: 防止违反既定法律或将违反法律的人绳之以法的机构
